question: What is the theme of 2017 International Mother Language Day (IMLD)?
option2: Mother tongue instruction and inclusive education
option3: Towards Sustainable Futures through Multilingual Education
answer: Towards Sustainable Futures through Multilingual Education
explanation: The International Mother Language Day (IMLD) is observed every year on February 21 to promote awareness of linguistic and cultural diversity and multilingualism. The 2017 theme is “Towards Sustainable Futures through Multilingual Education”.
